Sentencas: Residual stresses in a polycrystalline material have been determined experimentally at different length scales using three different techniques, with the aim of obtaining quantitative values.
Titulo: Multiscale measurements of residual strains in a stabilized zirconia layer

Sentencas: The polycrystalline material used is the electrolyte of solid oxide fuel cells, made of yttria-stabilized zirconia and submitted to a high biaxial compression stress state.
Titulo: Multiscale measurements of residual strains in a stabilized zirconia layer

Sentencas: Macroscopic measurements were performed using traditional X-ray diffraction with the sin2?
Titulo: Multiscale measurements of residual strains in a stabilized zirconia layer
Multiscale measurements of residual strains in a stabilized zirconia layer

Sentencas: Residual stresses within the grains were determined by the X-ray microdiffraction technique using synchrotron radiation.
Titulo: Multiscale measurements of residual strains in a stabilized zirconia layer

Sentencas: The variation in the strain within each grain was analysed by high-resolution electron backscatter diffraction.
Titulo: Multiscale measurements of residual strains in a stabilized zirconia layer

Sentencas: The results are self-consistent and give further information on the relation between strain/stress values and grain orientation, and on intragranular strain variations.
Titulo: Multiscale measurements of residual strains in a stabilized zirconia layer

Sentencas: These results are very important for the validation of mechanical microscopic constitutive equations.
Titulo: Multiscale measurements of residual strains in a stabilized zirconia layer
